generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the road, bordered by trees and covered with fallen leaves.
- building: A multi-story building with windows and storefronts is visible on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees with green and some autumn-colored leaves line the right side of the road.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a dark green sedan in the foreground and a white van parked on the left.
- pole: A tall pole, likely for street lighting or signage, is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign with a pedestrian symbol is visible on the left side of the road.
